content.description: Sic quievimus et somnum petivimus: satis erat.
content.question: How is the sentence translated?

choices.label: Thus, we rested and sought sleep: it was enough.
Thus, let us rest and seek sleep: it will be enough.
Thus, we will rest and we will seek sleep: it is enough.
Thus, we are resting and seeking sleep: it has been enough.

content.answer: Thus, we rested and sought sleep: it was enough.
